title: LF teammates to climb with to Gold
body: Was gold the past 2 seasons but managed to only get it by playing throughout the year. This year I will be very busy due to my first year in University so I'm trying to climb back to gold in a week before I have to leave for Uni. Hmu or add me if you're keen on grinding through the week to get to gold and above.

replies.body: You say you will be busy with your first year of uni, little does he know 4 weeks in everyone is like fuckit imma procrastinate by playing league
